name: Just A Game (itch) (MuchosWaffles)
description:
Made for the Community Game Jam with the theme, The Game Is A Liar

(Although I interpreted the theme more like the game itself is a lie rather than the game being a liar)

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/ARROWS to move
  • SPACE to jump

I planned to make a platformer where the main character was living in a simulation, which started to brake behind them. The goal would be to make it out of the simulation by going through a certain amount of levels. 

I only had a couple days to work on this, and this is what I ended up with. I spent too much time on smaller details and had to rush larger more important aspects, so it only has 4 very short "levels" and probably takes 5-10 minutes max.
